mapper.select: SELECT f.*, a.accommodation_name, a.accommodation_address, ai.accommodation_image_url FROM favorite f FULL OUTER JOIN accommodation a ON f.accommodation_id = a.accommodation_id FULL OUTER JOIN accommodation_image ai ON a.accommodation_id = ai.accommodation_id AND ai.accommodation_image_id = ( SELECT accommodation_image_id FROM accommodation_image WHERE accommodation_id = a.accommodation_id ORDER BY accommodation_image_id ASC LIMIT 1 ) WHERE f.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM favorite WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND favorite_id = #{favoriteId}
